body.name: upHere 120mm Case Fan,Support 5V ARGB Addressable Motherboard SYNC,Colorful Cooler Speed Adjustable with Fan Control Hub for PC Cases, CPU Coolers,Radiators System,6-Pack,SR12-06-6
features: 1.RC & 5V ARGB SYNC: Built with the advanced ARGB lighting system,support 5V 3PIN ARGB motherboard synchronization,also support remote control.Multiple rgb modes can be switched,makes your computer case colorful.
02.Unlimited color transformation, One key to change RGB color.Enjoy the beautiful RGB effect and nice heat dissipation effect by upHere SR12-06 RGB case fans, bring you cool gaming experience.
03.Long Service Life:Wear resistant hydraulic bearing construction makes the fan run noiseless and the air aolume larger with an astounding service life of more than 40,000 hours.
04.Fan Blades Design:The 9 blades are designed for high-volume air delivery while keeping noise to a minimum level.
05.What You Get: SR12-06 RGB Case Fan, our worry-free 12-month warranty and friendly customer service.
body.description: upHere SR1206 PC RGB Case Fan Technical Spec: Model:SR12-06Size(mm):120*120*25mmConnector:SataFan Speed:1180RPM±10%Airflow:41.2CFMNoise:19.9 dB(A)Rated Power: 1.8WWeight:129.6g Packing list: SR12-06 RGB Case Fan X 6 Screw X 24 Remote X 1 Control hub X 1

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vibrant RGB lighting effect: RGB LED keeps your system cool while illuminating your case with vibrant colors. Maintain color and brightness uniformity. The lighting effect is visible from all directions and adds aesthetics to the chassis. Enhanced frame structure: Enhanced frame structure,reducing turbulence and noise while increasing overall efficiency. Good heat dissipation performance: 9 fan blades effectively improve the diversion effect,prevent vibration and keep silent. Diversion design for efficient heat dissipation.

Long Service Life: Hydraulic bearing with long service life to reduce noise and improve heat dissipation efficiency. 2-IN-1 RC Control: Different from most basic RGB Fans controlled by fan hub and pc reset key.More intelligent and convenient to control on/off and choose preferred lighting effect. 5V ARGB SYNC: Support the synchronization function of the 5V ARGB motherboard.Compatible with motherboard software includes US aura Sync, Gigabyte RGB FUSION, MSI Mystic Light Sync, etc. **Note:Not support 12V RGB port

5V ARGB/Remote switch: **If you want to use the motherboard to control the lighting effect function, please press the M/B button on the RC to switch to the motherboard control. upHere SR1206 PC RGB Case Fan Technical Spec: Model:SR12-06Size(mm):120*120*25mmConnector:SataFan Speed:1180RPM±10%Airflow:41.2CFMNoise:19.9 dB(A)Rated Power: 1.8WWeight:129.6g Packing list: SR12-06 RGB Case Fan X 6 Screw X 24 Remote X 1 Control hub X 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing price to performance
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Have been building gaming PCs for 22 years and have used every major brand of fans and I'm pretty shocked at how well these are performing for the price point I wasn't expecting much at time of purchase and was just getting these to put in my new case design prototype for testing and to my surprise they are actually really good love the wireless remote it has so many features with multiple themes , speeds, brightness, and can even select the mobo rbg controller to run them all at a push of a button even with all fans at almost silent speed they are moving alot of air and couldn't be happier with making these my daily PC choice I highly recommend these and will purchase again in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget RGB fans!
reviews.reviewText: They are definitely RGB fans but I was pleasantly surprised the controller was SATA powered and not molex. The complaint being a cheap kit is the controller and remote. Very intermittent control with the remote. Half of the functions worked. The bright side? I reached out to HI PC and had amazing customer service. They were quick to response and without hesitation helped diagnose and are sending a a replacement controller and remote. Great customer care for sure. Hassle free. Product is easy to install and the fans look great for the price.Update: got the replacement parts and everything works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for a budget.
reviews.reviewText: Not much to complain about when it comes to Bang for buck, they are more for visuals than performance and definitely feel cheap to the touch. when it comes to how much air they can push on max speed, its definitely lack luster but they give you enough fans that it doesn't matter and they look great while doing just enough, perfect for a budget build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fans but I lost the remote is there any replacement part I can order
reviews.reviewText: Very good fans work great and love how bright they are. Only thing is I lost the fan and no longer can control lighting or speed. Is there any way to replace just the remote

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So quiet and fast!
reviews.reviewText: These things work great. They’re quite and were super easy to set up in my pc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Facil de instalar, el control de los leds es bueno, la configuracion con la placa al menos con asrock no funciona por ende no se puede sincronizar, pero no afecta la funcionalidad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked good until the controller broke
reviews.reviewText: They worked good until the controller broke. I had them for a couple of months and the looked great and had a decent noise level. Just what you would expect from 36$ fans. However I can no longer control anything on the fans because the controller broke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome deal for RGB Fan Kit!!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my computer and wanted to modernize with a little RGB so I picked up this kit. The lighting is even cooler in person then it lookjs in the pictures. It's hard to capture the color changing in a camera still shot but it's really cool. Fans have good cable length and control box was super simple to plug in and stick on. You can spend over an hour just playing with the different modes. The remote is easy to use and makes up for lack of motherboard support pretty well.Wish it had a magnet instead of an adhesive pad but I did peel it once to move it and it wasn't that harsh to pull off and it stayed put in the new spot. Whatever that pad is, it's almost as good as a magnet though I wouldn't try to move it too many times. I would definitely recommend this kit, especially if you are on a budget but even if not it's still worth a look. They made my 8 year old case look new again.
